sect2.title: Installation of GNOME Applets
sect2.para: Install GNOME Applets by running the following commands:

userinput.command: PRE=`pkg-config --variable=prefix ORBit-2.0` && ./configure --prefix=$PRE --libexecdir=$PRE/sbin \ --localstatedir=/var/lib --sysconfdir=/etc/gnome && make tooldir=$PRE/lib/gnome-applets && make tooldir=$PRE/lib/gnome-applets install && unset PRE
